titleStmt.title: Man become guilty, or, The corrruption of nature by sinne, according to St. Augustines sense written originally in French by Iohn-Francis Senault ; and put into English by ... Henry, Earle of Monmouth.
Homme criminel. English
titleStmt.author: Senault, Jean-François, 1601-1672.
Monmouth, Henry Carey, Earl of, 1596-1661.
